products.title: San Diego Padres Heavyweight T-Shirt - Natural
products.body_html:
Materials & Care
• 100% combed cotton
• Machine wash with similar colours and tumble dry on a low setting or hang to dry

Features
• Officially licensed MLB merchandise
• Heavyweight
• Wide neck ribbing
• Preshrunk for minimal shrinkage

Size & Fit
• Unisex sizing
• Relaxed, oversized fit
products.tags: 100% Cotton, Core, Essentials, F/W 22, Fan, Final Few, Heavyweight, Ivory, MLB, MLB Expansion, Natural, On Demand, San Diego Padres, T-Shirts, under 65, Unisex, US Food Bank
